caption:
Back at the NXT Conclave 2025, I had the honour of joining 20 visionary global leaders to speak on something deeply close to my heart, emotional and mental well-being. 🇮🇳

It felt historic to represent India with tools that aren’t new or foreign, but timeless and rooted.

 And it was even more special because our honourable PM Shri Narendra Modi Ji has been one of the first global leaders to give lifestyle and preventive health the stage it deserves.

From yoga to sunlight, from stillness to service, India’s always had these answers.

Here’s how you can start bringing them into your day:
☀️ Start with nature. Wake up, step into natural light, walk barefoot, breathe deeply, these aren’t trends, they’re time-tested tools.
 🧘🏽 Build inner peace. Through prayer, pranayama, or Surya Namaskar, whatever helps you go inward.
 🌀 Reframe stress. It’s not always a threat; it’s often a challenge, inviting growth.
 📚 Keep learning. Stay open, stay humble, wisdom often comes from unexpected places.
 🤝 Connect and give. Whether through volunteering or simple kindness, acts of service are powerful medicine.
 🎧 Guard your mind. Just like food, what you feed your mind matters; choose content that aligns with your values.
 🙏🏽 Gratitude always. Especially on tough days. It shifts perspective, softens the heart, and brings clarity.

This isn’t about a perfect routine. It’s about returning to what’s always worked.
 Small, consistent steps that help you evolve, mentally, emotionally, and spiritually.
Heal in India. Made in India. Rooted in India.

We’ve also compiled a comprehensive booklet the Bharat Lifestyle Plan that was presented to our honourable Prime Minister for all of you to see, download, learn, share and implement in your lives.
